design_philosophy.concept: Digital Trattoria - Fusion of Rustic Italian & Modern AI
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Nonna's Kitchen' warmth with 'Sci-Fi' AI precision.
Emotion First: Every screen must feel appetizing and welcoming.
Content is King: Recipes are the heroes; UI frames them like art.
Zoom In: Use macro photography for ingredients to evoke taste.
Negative Space: Generous padding to mimic a clean kitchen counter.

usage_rules.headings: Use Playfair Display for all H1-H3. Font weights: 600 or 700. Tracking: tight.
usage_rules.body: Use Manrope for all UI text, inputs, and recipes. Font weights: 400, 500, 600.
usage_rules.special: Use italic Playfair Display for 'Chef's Notes' or 'AI Tips'.

foreground.description: Espresso - Deep warm brown, softer than black

accent.description: Golden Yolk - For ratings and highlights

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for containers. Gap-4 or Gap-6 for grids.
layout.grid_strategy: Mobile-first. Single column (grid-cols-1) for mobile. Two columns (grid-cols-2) for tablet. Masonry/Bento for desktop recipe feeds.
layout.container_style: Rounded-xl or Rounded-2xl. No sharp edges. Soft shadows: shadow-sm or shadow-md.
layout.navigation: Bottom Navigation Bar (Fixed) for Mobile. Hidden on Desktop (use Top Nav).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 rounded-full px-6 py-4

cards.recipe_card: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-2xl overflow-hidden border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all group relative
cards.ingredient_card: bg-muted/50 rounded-xl p-4 flex items-center gap-3 border border-transparent hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors

inputs.default: bg-background border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-xl h-12 px-4

feedback.toast: Use Sonner. Style: bg-background border-border text-foreground shadow-lg rounded-xl.

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise texture to the background (opacity 0.03) to give it a paper feel.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use colored shadows. e.g., shadow-orange-500/20 for primary buttons.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Avoid full gradients. Use subtle radial gradients for 'spotlight' effects behind hero images.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide React. Stroke width: 1.5px (Elegant). Color: CurrentColor.

hero_background.description: Rich Italian food spread, warm lighting

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Copy the `css_variables` into `src/index.css` (replace existing root/dark). Update `tailwind.config.js` to extend font families.
3. MOBILE FIRST: Always design for 375px width first. Use `w-full` and `flex-col` by default.
4. PWA OPTIMIZATION: Ensure touch targets are at least 44px. Use `min-h-[44px]` for buttons/inputs.
5. DATA-TESTID: Add `data-testid` to ALL interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards). Format: `category-function-element` (e.g., `auth-login-button`).
6. NO MOCKING: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
7. LANGUAGE: The app content must be in ITALIAN as per requirements.
8. FILE EXTENSIONS: Use .js and .jsx as the project is JavaScript based.

must_do: Add subtle noise/grain to backgrounds if possible
